ÅyÅ¼ki do butÃ³w to znakomite wsparcie dla **seniorÃ³w** oraz osÃ³b z ograniczonÄ… mobilnoÅ›ciÄ…. UÅ‚atwiajÄ… one codzienne zakÅ‚adanie obuwia, eliminujÄ…c koniecznoÅ›Ä‡ schylania siÄ™, co czyni caÅ‚y proces bardziej komfortowym i bezpiecznym.

ÅyÅ¼ka do butÃ³w **chroni obuwie** przed deformacjami oraz uszkodzeniami, zwÅ‚aszcza w okolicy piÄ™ty. UÅ¼ywanie Å‚yÅ¼ki **przedÅ‚uÅ¼a Å¼ywotnoÅ›Ä‡ butÃ³w**. Pomaga uniknÄ…Ä‡ trwaÅ‚ych odksztaÅ‚ceÅ„ oraz rozwarstwiania siÄ™ szwÃ³w, a takÅ¼e chroni delikatne elementy wykoÅ„czenia, ktÃ³re mogÄ… byÄ‡ naraÅ¼one na uszkodzenia podczas zakÅ‚adania obuwia.

Funkcje ochronne Å‚yÅ¼ek do butÃ³w moÅ¼na podsumowaÄ‡ w nastÄ™pujÄ…cy sposÃ³b:

**DÅ‚ugoÅ›Ä‡** Å‚yÅ¼ki rÃ³wnieÅ¼ wpÅ‚ywa na komfort uÅ¼ytkowania:

nodes.name: Update Document with Correct HTML Formatting

parameters.content:
ğŸ“ Markdown to Google Docs Converter

ğŸ¯ PURPOSE: Convert Markdown content to formatted Google Docs documents with automatic timestamping and Drive organization

âš™ï¸ SETUP REQUIRED:
â€¢ Google Drive OAuth2 credentials configured in n8n
â€¢ Target Google Drive folder URL
â€¢ Content title and Markdown text input

ğŸ“‹ HOW TO USE:
1. Configure Google Drive credentials in n8n settings
2. Update "Set Input Data" node with:
   - Google Drive URL (target folder)
   - Content Title (document name)
   - Content in Markdown (your text)
3. Click "Test workflow" to execute
4. Check your Google Drive for timestamped document

ğŸ”§ CUSTOMIZE:
â€¢ Modify HTML formatting options in "Change Markdown To HTML" node
â€¢ Adjust file naming pattern in "Create Empty File" node  
â€¢ Change Drive location metadata in "Add Information About Google Drive Location"
â€¢ Update MIME type handling in "Change Mime Type of The File"

ğŸ’¡ USE CASES:
â€¢ Technical documentation (README â†’ Google Docs)
â€¢ Content publishing workflow (draft â†’ review)
â€¢ Blog/article preparation (Markdown â†’ collaborative editing)
â€¢ Report generation with automated formatting
